attributes.action: make Bruce Forsyth a Knight of the Realm.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bruce Forsyth has been entertaining us on television for the best part of 50 years.  He is well loved for all his quirky catch phrases, and is a fantastic host to the Saturday Night show "Strictly Come Dancing" on BBC1.  So come on Mr Brown, recognise this stalwart of British Entertainment in the fashion he deserves!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
